steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ct66","text":"Treat 500,000 BMDM’s with DMSO or   MLi-2 for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"249C2520FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"16C471A0FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4k5c","text":"After the treatment, wash the cells 3X in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1bkh","text":"Harvest the cells in   of ice-cold hypotonic buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"3A0197B0FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3v6bj","text":"Homogenize the cells with 20 strokes of a Dounce homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g2sh","text":"To   of this homogenate, add SDS (1% final) and   of Benzonase (Novagen). Use this as total lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"424204F0FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"4594B260FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1834}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd7m","text":"Spin the rest of the homogenate at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3h87i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5CDC5270FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6fqim","text":"Collect the supernatant (cytoplasmic fraction) into a new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a2tp","text":"Resuspend the pellet (nuclear fraction) in   of high-salt buffer and solubilize with SDS (1% final) in the presence of   of Benzonase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"7311E640FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"7728CE10FA1A11EDBDDA41DCC6DB3AAC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1834}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckk13","text":"Measure protein concentration with the BCA reagent (Thermo Scientific), and subsequently analyze the samples by immunoblotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
